summary: An Ordinance approving the assessment roll of Local Improvement District No. 1529, for the improvement of the alley in Block Sixty-one (61), A. A. Denny's Addition to the town (now City) of Seattle; the same being the alley between Sixth Avenue and Seventh Avenue, from University Street to Union Street, by paving the same with vitrified brick, laid upon a proper concrete foundation, together with all sewers and appurtenances that may be necessary under Ordinance No. 16543, and assessing the amounts thereof against each parcel and lot of land and part thereof shown in said roll, and providing for the collection thereof.
